total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the locations of the numbers 1, 2, 3, 4 in the input grid.
Q2: Identify the pattern of the number 8 in the input grid.
Q3: Determine the relationship between the locations of the numbers 1, 2, 3, 4 and the pattern of the number 8.
Q4: Based on the relationship determined in Q3, predict the locations of the numbers 1, 2, 3, 4 in the output grid.
Q5: Determine the pattern of the number 8 in the output grid based on the pattern in the input grid and the locations of the numbers 1, 2, 3, 4.
Q6: Combine the locations of the numbers 1, 2, 3, 4 and the pattern of the number 8 to generate the output grid.

Q5: Apply the changes predicted in Q4 to the input grid to generate the output grid.
